roleset.name: set into place, again
roleset.note: REDEPLOY-V NOTES: Frames file for 'redeploy' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry at the moment. Also no entry for 'deploy,' oddly enough. (from redeploy.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: the one example
example.text: First, they are designed to eliminate the risk of prepayment -- mortgage-backed securities can be retired early if interest rates decline, and such prepayment forces investors to redeploy their money at lower rates.
